title: Getting Started
content: To get started with Sajilo Sarkar, access the web portal and create an account. Once registered, you can easily report public infrastructure issues by following the simple reporting process.

title: Reporting an Issue
content: To report an issue, log in to your account, describe the problem, upload relevant photos, and pinpoint the exact location using the integrated map features.

title: Tracking Your Report
content: You can track the status of your reported issues through your account dashboard. The government department responsible for the issue will update the status as they work on resolving it.

title: Managing Your Account
content: Keep your profile information up to date to receive timely notifications and updates regarding your reports. Ensure your contact details are accurate.

title: FAQs
content: Visit our FAQ section to find answers to common questions about using the Sajilo Sarkar portal and reporting issues effectively.
